<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twin Distraction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1789) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Twin Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=552)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.

</column>

---

Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent. When using Twin Feint, if both your Strikes deal damage to a targeted creature, the target must succeed at a Will saving throw against your class DC or become [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) until the end of your next turn.
name: Twin Distraction
requirement: You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.
